author: Tabletop Minions
description:
That's right: Gen Con, the largest tabletop gaming convention in the country, is next week and I'll be there again. I'll be checking out all the cool new games, see the weird and unknown, and hopefully have fun and get good footage. And if you're there, I'll be having a meet-up as well. I'll talk about that, and of course I'll answer your wargaming-related questions. Come have fun!

Vince Venturella and I made ANOTHER game! Check out Reign in Iron - miniatures-agnostic robot vs. demon skirmish combat at http://www.reigninirongame.com

I'm a member of The Army Painter Factory Team - and I'm passing the savings on to you! Use code 'FactoryUncle5' at checkout to get 5% off of your entire order at http://www.thearmypainter.com or check my favorite Army Painter products at https://thearmypainter.com/tabletop-minions

I'm now a partner on Twitch! I paint minis every Friday morning and Monday night, and sometimes take paint breaks (play video games poorly). Follow me: http://www.twitch.tv/ta
title: Heading Back to GEN CON - The Ever Other Sunday Show
